DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare laparoscopic total extraperitoneal and open mesh repair of inguinal hernia, with regard to hospital stay, postoperative pain, quality of life, postoperative recovery and return to daily activities, complications and recurrences
DOC.brief_title: LEVEL Trial: Correction of Inguinal Hernia, Endoscopic Versus Lichtenstein
DOC.criteria: informed consent age > 18 years inguinal hernia(primary, recurrence or bilateral) elective procedure Scrotal hernia Prostatectomy, Pfannenstiehlincision, preperitoneal surgery in history Participation in other trial Pregnancy Communicative or cognitive restrictions
